Tariro Mnangagwa (a mụrụ n'afọ 1986) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-echekwa ihe. A maara ya maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri afọ 2020 Gonarezhou
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye isi ala Zimbabwe ugbu a bụ Emmerson Mnangagwa.
A mụrụ Mnangagwa na Harare nye Onye isi ala Emmerson Mnangagwa n'aka Jayne Matarise, onye nwụrụ n'abalị 31 ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2002 n'ihi ọrịa kansa akpa nwa
Mnangagwa nwere ụmụnne ise tọrọ ya: Farai, Tasiwa, Vimbayi, Tapiwa, na Emmerson Tanaka
O nwekwara ụmụnne atọ site na alụmdi na nwunye nke abụọ nke nna ya. Mnangagwa nwetara diplọma na Professional Photography na CityVarsity nke Cape Town
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Honours na Sport Management na Cape Peninsula University of Technology
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Zimbabwe, Mnangagwa sonyeere Akashinga, otu ndị inyom na-egbochi ịchụ nta
Mgbe ahụ, ọ ghọrọ onye otu ndị inyom niile na-alụ ọgụ megide ịchụ nta a na-akpọ International Anti-Poaching Foundation.

N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na ihe nkiri Gonarezhou onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri ahụ, Sydney Taivavashe. A na-emepụta ihe nkiri ahụ na njikọ aka na Zimbabwe Parks and Wildlife Management Authority. N'ime ihe nkiri ahụ, Tariro rụrụ ọrụ 'Sergeant Onai' yana mepụta ihe nkiri ahụ.
